channel.title: [PI]Need to make working doors,or just delete the doors[PI] Who help ++rep
channel.description:
Hi, i need little help,i don't know how to remove doors,or just making them working,i tryed to remove it in ObjectManager.java ,but it not working... Code: [code] c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2521, 3381, 1, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2510, 3380, 1, 10); [/code]
I try to make them opening in doors.cfg but it dosen't work too...
Please help me :)
I need to remove these doors: [img]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/4426/17529315.png[/img] [img]http://img685.imageshack.us/img685/7432/40970510.png[/img]
Thanks :) Who helps, ++rep

item.title: [PI]Need to make working doors,or just delete the doors[PI] Who help ++rep
item.dc:creator: @ITI_Basak_ITI ITI Basak ITI
item.description:
@ITI_Basak_ITI wrote:

Place this code in your doors file:

door = 2510 3380 0 -1 0
door = 2510 3379 0 0 1

Make sure that that you put: door(space)=(space)2510(tab)3380(tab)0(tab)-1(tab)0
and for the next line the same thing just other coor, open, and other face: door(space)=(space)2510(tab)3379(tab)0(tab)0(tab)1

once you have that… save it… and go to action handle… find the doors file and add:

case 1530:
case 1531:

save it, compile, and will work… if it doesnt, then you did something wrong

Read full topic

item.source: [PI]Need to make working doors,or just delete the doors[PI] Who help ++rep

item.title: [PI]Need to make working doors,or just delete the doors[PI] Who help ++rep
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“aivaroza4, post:3, topic:393857”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=491042.msg3590664#msg3590664 date=1304612978]
There is a doors.cfg you use that to set how they move.

You also have to use actionhandler.java. You make a case for that object id.

Can you explain more?Can you give me Case code? and doors.cfg code? Thanks

[/quote][/quote]

go to data>cfg>doors.cfg

the doors .cfg is like this

door space = space xcoord space ycoord tab height tab direction tab openorshut tab //info

and go to src>server>model>players>actionhandler.java

search for something like Server.objectHandler.doorHandling

Right above that add the object id.

so it would be like case space objectid:

Read full topic
